name: renative-wrapper
description: ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ Unified Development Platform. Bootstrap, Develop & Deploy `iOS`, `tvOS`, `Android`, `Android TV`, `Fire TV`, `Android Wear`, `Web`, `Tizen TV`, `Tizen Watch`, `Tizen Mobile`, `LG webOS`, `macOS/OSX`, `Windows`, `KaiOS`, `FirefoxOS`, `Firefox TV`, `Linux` and `Chromecast` platforms
author: Pavel Jacko <pavel.jacko@gmail.com> (https://github.com/pavjacko)

scripts.bootstrap: yarn run link:rnv && npx lerna bootstrap && yarn build
scripts.bootstrap-clean: rm -rf ./node_modules; npx lerna clean --yes && yarn bootstrap
scripts.link:rnv: cd packages/rnv && (yarn unlink || true) && yarn link
scripts.git-commit: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitCommit -r
scripts.git-tag: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitTag -r
scripts.git-commit-tag: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitCommitAndTag -r
scripts.deploy-all: npm run test && npm run deploy-prepare && npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.deploy:feat: npm run test && npm run deploy-prepare && npm run git-commit-tag && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag feat --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.deploy:alpha: npm run deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag alpha --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.deploy:alpha:soft: npm run test && npm run deploy-prepare && npm run git-commit-tag && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag alpha --yes
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --yes && git push origin HEAD

title: ReNative
